005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIntegerItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.ArrayException;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.ArrayList;
022import java.util.List;
023
024import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
025
026public final class ArrayPut {
027  private static final String NAME = "put";
028  @NonNull
029  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
030      .name(NAME)
031      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
032      .deterministic()
033      .contextIndependent()
034      .focusIndependent()
035      .argument(IArgument.builder()
036          .name("array")
037          .type(IArrayItem.class)
038          .one()
039          .build())
040      .argument(IArgument.builder()
041          .name("position")
042          .type(IIntegerItem.class)
043          .one()
044          .build())
045      .argument(IArgument.builder()
046          .name("member")
047          .type(IItem.class)
048          .zeroOrMore()
049          .build())
050      .returnType(IArrayItem.class)
051      .returnOne()
052      .functionHandler(ArrayPut::execute)
053      .build();
054
055  private ArrayPut() {
056    // disable construction
057  }
058
059  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
060  @NonNull
061  private static <T extends ICollectionValue> ISequence<? extends IArrayItem<T>> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
062      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
063      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
064      IItem focus) {
065    IArrayItem<T> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
066        arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
067    IIntegerItem position = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
068    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked") T member = (T) arguments.get(2).toCollectionValue();
069
070    return put(array, position, member).asSequence();
071  }
072
073  /**
074   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
075   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-put">array:put</a>.
076   *
077   * @param <T>
078   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
079   * @param array
080   *          the target Metapath array
081   * @param positionItem
082   *          the integer position of the item to replace
083   * @param member
084   *          the Metapath item to replace the identified array member with
085   * @return a new array containing the modification
086   * @throws ArrayException
087   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
088   */
089  @NonNull
090  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> put(
091      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
092      @NonNull IIntegerItem positionItem,
093      @NonNull T member) {
094    return put(array, positionItem.asInteger().intValueExact(), member);
095  }
096
097  /**
098   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
099   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-put">array:put</a>.
100   *
101   * @param <T>
102   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
103   * @param array
104   *          the target Metapath array
105   * @param position
106   *          the integer position of the item to replace
107   * @param member
108   *          the Metapath item to replace the identified array member with
109   * @return a new array containing the modification
110   * @throws ArrayException
111   *           if the position is not in the range of 1 to array:size
112   */
113  @NonNull
114  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> put(
115      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array,
116      int position,
117      @NonNull T member) {
118    List<T> copy = new ArrayList<>(array);
119    try {
120      copy.set(position - 1, member);
121    } catch (IndexOutOfBoundsException ex) {
122      throw new ArrayException(
123          ArrayException.INDEX_OUT_OF_BOUNDS,
124          String.format("The position %d is outside the range of values for the array of size '%d'.",
125              position,
126              copy.size()),
127          ex);
128    }
129
130    return IArrayItem.ofCollection(copy);
131  }
132}
